text: Berom端nster is a municipality in Sursee in the canton of Lucerne in Switzerland. ==History== Since 2004, Schwarzenbach part of the municipality. On 1 January 2009 Gunzwil became part of Berom端nster. On 1 January 2013 the Neudorf became part of Berom端nster. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Municipalities in Sursee Category:Cities in Switzerland
